text:
We transferred ownership from <https://github.com/hdrake/ClimateMARGO.jl> to <https://github.com/ClimateMARGO/ClimateMARGO.jl>
The package ClimateMARGO.jl still works, but the `@JuliaRegistrator register()`  does not trigger our robot friend anymore. What can we do to fix it?

does not trigger our robot friend anymore. What can we do to fix it?

text: Update the url in the registry
